name: Engage Fitness
description: Engage Fitness Collective offers a variety of LIVE virtual fitness classes with a team of professional instructors. You may be the only one in your room, but you’ve got a LIVE coach and a community supporting you on your screen. Offering 90+ weekly classes with 24 instructors across the world. Come check us out. First class free!
features: Live means real-time instruction. Even if you choose to have your video off, you’ll hear and feel our support.
When you join EFC, you’re investing in yourself, you’re investing in your favorite instructor, and you’re investing in our planet.
As a member, you’ll have access to all instructors and classes! Finding a class to fit your needs and your schedule has never been easier.
Headline: Real time. Real people. Real fun.
ShortDescription: Engage Fitness Collective offers a variety of LIVE virtual fitness classes with a team of professional instructors.
enhanced_description: Engage Fitness Collective provides a wide range of LIVE virtual fitness classes, delivered in real-time by a team of professional instructors globally. Members benefit from direct live coaching and a supportive community, even when training individually. With over 90 weekly classes and 24 instructors available, finding a suitable class is made easy, and members gain access to all offerings. The service emphasizes real-time instruction, fostering engagement and supporting personal well-being for employees within corporate wellness programs.
competitive_advantages: Unlimited access to all instructors and classes for members
Emphasis on investment in self, instructors, and the planet
primary_users: Employees (as beneficiaries of corporate wellness programs)
